subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: São Paulo, South America’s largest city, could lose its right to stage matches at the 2014 World Cup in Brazil because of delays in building its stadium, soccer’s governing body, FIFA, warned.
snippet: São Paulo, South America’s largest city, could lose its right to stage matches at the 2014 World Cup in Brazil because of delays in building its stadium, soccer’s governing body, FIFA, warned.
